author: chris-dollin
msg: working on a Small memory-based graph

author: chris-dollin
msg: Arranged that a NodeToTriplesMap add/remove returns true if the item
was actually added or removed, and used that to avoid having to add
to more than one of the index maps in GRaphMem.

author: chris-dollin
msg: The selection-by-pattern part of GraphMem.find has been pushed into
NodeToTriplesMap. That class now knows how to pick the indexing
component from a triple using the abstract method getIndexNode();
each of GraphMem's maps is specialised to the appropriate node. This
allowed the .remove code for the wrapping iterators to be made the
same and pushed into the local static class Removable, simplifying
the code of GraphMem.find and its sub-methods.
TrackingTripleIterator ahs been simplified but retained.
TripleFieldIterator has been made obsolete (its job is covered by
Removable).
NoteToTriplesMaps now have a .remove(Triple) method; getIndexNode()
extracts the node which is the key into the embedded Node->Set(Triple)
map.

author: der
msg: Patched parsing of -ve numeric literals

author: chris-dollin
msg: Altering NodeToTriplesMap to push in the triple-matching functionality
requried by GraphMem and making consequent changes to GraphMem, with a
view to (a) simplifying GraphMem and (b) allowing GraphMem to get by
with fewer indexes on user request.
This is an intermediate state which passes all the tests; more work on
GraphMem to follow.
